activities:
(1) Personal data received in the course of Caradigm's activities, which vary according to the product or service and which often include sales, evaluation, implementation, support, and analysis to manage and improve products and services.
(2) Human resources data
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: on-line, off-line, and manually processed customer and human resources data
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss FDPIC
